ygData.subject: Re: Jewelry skill cap
ygData.msgSnippet: if the cap is at 200, which i am close to, how do you know what kind of Platinum jewelry you can make? do you just try it, and hope it happenes? i am confused
ygData.messageBody:
if the cap is at 200, which i am close to, how do you know what kind of
Platinum jewelry you can make?
do you just try it, and hope it happenes? i am confused as to platinum stuff
>
> From: "Paul Jesernig" <pwj@...>
>
> Jewelry skill will cap at 200 so that no platinum items become trivial.
> There is no level cap for trade skills. Main skills are capped at
> (5xlevel)+5, but trade skills do not have this level limitation. Two
> different meanings of skill caps. Hope this clears up the confusion.
>
> Lozi, CT
>
> >
